caption: OpenTelemetry Exporters Dictionary
description: Dictionary of attributes for the OpenTelemetry Exporters extension
name: otel_exporters_dictionary

otel_exporter_config.caption: OpenTelemetry Exporter Configuration
otel_exporter_config.description: Configuration for exporting observability data to various backends

otel_retry_config.caption: OpenTelemetry Retry Configuration
otel_retry_config.description: Configuration for retry behavior when exports fail

otel_batch_config.caption: OpenTelemetry Batch Configuration
otel_batch_config.description: Configuration for batching telemetry data before export

otel_pipeline_config.caption: OpenTelemetry Pipeline Configuration
otel_pipeline_config.description: Complete pipeline configuration for agent observability

pipeline_type.caption: Pipeline Type
pipeline_type.description: Type of telemetry data the pipeline handles

auth_type.caption: Authentication Type
auth_type.description: Type of authentication to use for exports
